name: Canasta Gold
description:
Canasta is one of the great classics among card games.

Regardless of whether you’re a seasoned Canasta player or giving it a go for the first time: If you like card games, you’ll love Canasta!

Our Canasta app follows the classic rules of the game and offers additional settings. You can play alone or in a team against one or two strong opponents.

With Canasta for the iPhone & iPad, you no longer have to find someone to play with and you have the chance to refine your Canasta strategy anywhere and anytime.

-programmable player ability
-classic rules (adjustable)
-“2 against 2” or “4 against 4”
-original Altenburg playing cards

Canasta is the perfect game for anyone who enjoys playing rummy, MauMau, Phase 10™ or UNO™!

** Stay in touch with us! Follow us on facebook! http://www.facebook.com/LiteGames/ **
